vocabulary.definition: having difficulty dealing with a problem (luchando, teniendo dificultades)
a building where goods are manufactured (fábrica)
a place where vehicles are repaired or stored (garaje, taller)
achieving a goal or having wealth and recognition (exitoso)
causing admiration due to size, quality, or skill (impresionante)
a decorative hanging light with branches (candelabro, lámpara de araña)
the top inside surface of a room (techo, cielo raso)
to add things to make a place more attractive (decorar)
a room with a toilet and sink, sometimes a shower (baño)
to pause before saying or doing something (dudar, vacilar)
to move the head up and down to show agreement (asentir con la cabeza)
a small case for carrying money and cards (billetera, cartera)
to physically express happiness by jumping (saltar de emoción)
to experience sadness or guilt (sentirse mal)
